inn1.comm: lets the first ball go outside the off stump.
first runs, opens the face off the bat and glides it down to third man.
yorker right on target and Gayle just gets his bat down in time.
in the slot for Gayle but he hits it straight to the fielder at extra cover.
full toss driven to mid-on.
good delivery first up, swinging in and on target, Barath plays it watchfully to the off side.
plays forward and gets a thickish outside edge in the gap between the keeper and slip to the fence for a boundary. A difficult chance for either of them.
lets it go outside the off stump.
another leave outside the off stump.
once again watches it closely and lets it go through to the keeper.
outside the off stump and left alone.
Yorker and Gayle gets an edge down to fine leg.
impact on the pad and sliding down the leg side.
swinging in and Gayle lets the ball go, it was close to the off stump.
this time the ball swings away, lets it go.
good ball swinging in and on target, watchfully played by Gayle.
outside the off stump and Gayle steers it to the left of Kapugedera at backward point, excellent diving stop by him.
defends on the front foot.
on the pads and off it down to fine leg fence for leg byes.
too far outside the off stump and left alone.
width for Barath, was swinging away and Barath chases it and gets beaten.
way down the leg side and signaled a wide.
driven on the front foot to mid-off.
digs out a quick yorker and picks up a quick single to mid-off.
outside the off stump and Barath lets it go.
opens the face off the bat and steers it down to third man.
defends on the front foot to the off side.
defended once again.
pushes to mid-on for a quick single.
comes forward and drives to extra cover, looking to come down the track.
driven once again straight to extra cover, Gayle unable to find the gap once again.
on the front foot and Gayle plays with an angled bat to cover point.
comes down the track and looks to smash down the ground, the ball goes over the middle stump.
opens the face off the bat and steers it down to third man.
short ball and Gayle pulls it to deep backward square leg and Murali tries to stop with his boots near the boundary line but no chance.
down the track and drives to midwicket.
short and wide and Gayle smashes it over extra cover for a boundary. The players can only just watch the ball and appreciate the shot.
works to the onside to midwicket.
down the track and Gayle smashes it over the bowler head to the fence for his third boundary in the over.
defended on the front foot.
pushes to the off side and looking for a single, no response from Gayle at the other end.
opens the face off the bat and steers it down to third man.
short ball and Gayle smashes it to midwicket fence, this is powerful hitting from Gayle and he looks to be in an angry mood, smashing everything.
one more, this time all the way over the fence. Down the track and he hits it high and over mid-off and over the fence for a six.
on the front foot driven to extra cover.
drives it straight to short extra cover.
defended on the front foot.
steers it down to third man for a single.
plays it down to third man for a single.
on the back foot and Gayle pushes to midwicket for a quick single.
defended on the front foot.
works it to deep midwicket for couple of runs, fielded by Muralitharan.

Barath goes for a low score this time, pitches outside the off stump and coming in, keeps a bit low and Barath trying to pull, gets beaten and gets hit on the pad in line with the stumps, loud appeal and given by the umpire.
defended on the front foot.
Gayle follows Barath, Murali strikes first ball. Gayle comes forward and looks to defend, the ball pops up and hits the top off the bat and goes to gully and Samaraweera takes a good catch.
comes forward and defends once again.
defended.
defended to the off side.
defended on the front foot.
driven to deep extra cover and picks up couple of runs.
defends on the front foot.
turns it to the onside to midwicket.
straighter one from Murali, beats the outside edge.
defends on the front foot.
beats the outside edge and through to the keeper.
a wonderful over from Murali comes to an end.
comes forward and looks to defend, the impact is on the pad but just outside the line of the off stump. Loud appeal turned down.
another loud shout for lbw, swinging in and strikes the pad just outside the line of the off stump, turned down by the umpire.
tucks it down to fine leg and picks up couple of runs.
defends on the front foot.
on the front foot and driven down the ground for a single.
on the front foot and pushes wide of midwicket.
outside the off stump and left alone.
plays uppishly just wide of short extra cover.
driven back to the bowler.
driven on the front foot to mid-off.
driven to mid-on and Mahela fields the ball and throws the ball, misses the stumps, a run out chance.
on the back foot and glanced to fine leg.
driven to mid-off on the front foot.
cuts off the back foot to point.
down the leg side.
down the track and Bravo hits it down the ground and over the long off fence for a six, nice clean hit.
defended.
defended on the front foot.
driven back to the bowler.
worked to the onside to midwicket.
driven back to the bowler once again.
sweeps and off the pad to short fine leg.
cuts it to deep backward point and good save by Herath.
drives it wide of extra cover for a single.
defends on the front foot.
short ball and Bravo ducks under it.
on the front foot and driven to the sweeper cover.
pushed to the onside to midwicket.
on the back foot and he cuts to deep backward point.
works to the onside for a single.
driven to extra cover.
defends on the front foot.
short ball pulled to deep midwicket, just short of Malinga.
cuts off the back foot to sweeper cover.
plays it down to third man and picks up couple of runs.
driven straight to the onside to midwicket.
driven back to the bowler.
beats the outside edge.
defended on the front foot.
turns it to square leg.
down the track and driven down the ground to long on.
turns it behind square leg for a single.
defended to the off side.
down the track and then blocks it.
driven nicely and well fielded by Dilshan.
off the pad and down to fine leg.
sweeps in the air but just short of Herath.
driven down to deep midwicket.
defended.
comes down the track and defends.
on the front foot and drives to deep midwicket.
defended on the front foot to the onside.
looking for a single, not there as the fielder rushes to the ball.
defends it once again.
pushes to midwicket and scampers through for a quick single.
down the track and driven firmly, straight to Bravo.
driven to deep extra cover.

we have a run out, an unfortunate way to get out, Bravo drives straight back down the track and Herath gets his finger tips to the ball and it goes on to hit the stumps, Sarwan is caught outside the crease.
a huge hit from Bravo, goes over midwicket and almost to the road.
pushes to the onside for a single.
driven to the sweeper cover.
defended.
pushes to the onside to midwicket
comes forward to defend and gets an inside edge down to fine leg.
pushes to square leg.
defends to the off side.
on the back foot and pushes it to the sweeper.
defends on the front foot.
driven straight to short cover.
played down to third man.
down the track and driven to midwicket.
driven down the ground to long on.
down the leg side.
defends on the front foot.
turned to square leg and picks up a quick single.
down the track and driven hard but straight to midwicket.
played uppishly over extra cover to the fence for a boundary as Mahela runs in vain to stop that.
defended
works it to deep square leg and picks up couple of runs.
driven to midwicket for a single.
strikes the pad outside the line of the off stump, huge appeal turned down.
on the leg stump and glanced to fine leg.
beats the outside edge.
a massive six once again, down the track and hits it over the long on fence.
plays to short fine leg.
driven off the back foot to extra cover, misfield allows the single.
flicks it in the air to the backward square leg fence.
defended on the front foot.
off the pad to the onside.
Malinga strikes, gets Darren Bravo, good reverse swing, strikes him right in front of the stumps.
pushes for a quick single on the off side, a misfield allows an extra run.
driven hard but straight to mid-on.
pushes it to square leg.
defended to the onside.
worked to short fine leg.
pushes to the onside to midwicket.
defended.
chips it over the bowlers head for a single.
short ball and he ducks under it.
yorker right on target and Pollard defends.

another failure for Pollard, the reverse swing doing the trick once again, coming in sharply and beats the outside edge of Pollard's bat and hits the top of the off stump, excellent bowling from Malinga.
driven straight to short midwicket, excellent save by Dilshan.
driven down the ground to long on.
flicks it to deep square leg for a single.
defended on the front foot.
punches off the back foot to the sweeper cover for a single.
driven down the ground to long on.
driven to the sweeper cover for a single.
works it through the onside.
defends on the front foot.
slower delivery and watchfully played by Bravo.
digs in a short one, which goes over the head of Bravo, signaled a wide.
defends from the crease.
on the front foot and pushed to extra cover.
opens the face off the bat and steers it down to third man.
stands in the crease and punches it to the sweeper cover
full length delivery driven to mid-on, Murali fields the ball, no chance for a run.
short ball pulled to deep square leg.
on the front foot and driven down the ground to long off.
driven on the front foot to extra cover.
defended on the front foot.
appeal for a lbw, the impact is outside the leg stump.
another appeal, again misses the leg stump.
cuts it down to backward point.
off the back foot and angles it down to third man for a single.
flicks it to deep backward square leg.
defends on the front foot.
short and wide outside the off stump, cuts it down to third man.
played uppishly to sweeper cover, falls short of Mathews.
short and wide down the leg side.
driven on the front foot back to bowler.
flicks it to deep square leg.
spins the other way and Baugh lets it go.
driven down the ground to long on.
driven to long off this time.
played in the air down to long off.
off the back foot and cuts it nicely to deep backward point.
cut to sweeper cover for a single.
driven down the ground for a single.
cuts and gets a thick edge down to third man, well fielded by Tharanga.
sweeps it to deep fine leg and picks up couple of runs.
huge appeal for lbw, hits him high on the pad in line with the leg stump.
a well controlled sweep shot, hit  in the air to the square leg fence.
slower ball from Malinga, beats the outside edge.
another slower ball, this time it is short and once again beats the outside edge.
driven down the ground, beats Malinga, goes between his legs.
slower one once again, hits it in the air to deep midwicket, falls short of Kulasekara.
plays with soft hands and picks up a single.
slower one to end the over, Baugh gives himself room and tries to smash it, beats the outside edge.
on the front foot and driven to the sweeper cover.
driven to the sweeper cover for a single.
got him, bowled! Nice ball from Herath, pitches on the off stump and Bravo tries to flick to the onside, misses it completely and the middle stump is uprooted.
pushes to midwicket and gets off the mark.
down the leg side, off the pad to fine leg.
drives it along the ground to sweeper cover.
slower delivery, quick single to extra cover.
defended on the front foot.
reversing in and Sammy plays it watchfully.
a thickish edge down to fine leg, long chase for Mahela.
defended.
pushes for a single to the onside to midwicket.
down the leg side and hits Sanga's pads.
reverse sweeps to backward point.
on the leg stump and the impact is on the pads.
Sammy pushes to midwicket and there is hesitation from both the batsmen, Jayawardene quickly in throws it to Sangakkara to run out Sammy.
flicks it in the air straight to Jayawardene at midwicket, a simple catch.
defends on the front foot.
good delivery, spins in sharply and defended on the front foot.
pushes to cover and picks up a quick single.
slow yorker hits the bottom of the bat.
another yorker and watchfully played by Rampaul.
another swinging yorker and Rampaul looking to drive, misses it and the ball just misses the off stump.
defends on the front foot.
sweeps it to deep backward square leg.
gives himself room and drives it down the ground to long off.
played in the air to deep midwicket, Mathews takes the catch close to the line and throws the ball to Dilshan as he was losing balance.
swinging delivery and Rampaul tries it smash it, misses it completely and the off stump is knocked back.
driven to extra cover.
another slow yorker, quick single to extra cover.
pushes to the onside for a quick single.
works it to backward square leg for a single.
worked to midwicket for a single.
slower delivery driven down the ground to long off.
chips it in the air to the onside, good running, comes back for the second.
played in the air to deep midwicket and picks up couple of runs.
West Indies are bowled out of the final delivery, on the stumps and Roach tries to smash it, the ball beats the bat and the sound of timber.

inn2.comm: short ball goes way over the head, goes to the fence, signaled a wide.
lovely away swinger and beats the outside edge.
on the back foot and flicks it down to fine leg.
fuller delivery driven back to the bowler.
thick inside edge down to fine leg, just misses the leg stump.
swinging away outside the off stump and beats the outside edge.
defended off the back foot.
on the leg stump, played to midwicket.
short and wide outside the off stump, Dilshan cuts it down to third man.
on the legs and worked to deep square leg.
on the front foot and driven back to the bowler.
defended on the front foot.
outside the off stump, tries to cut and gets beaten.
defends on the back foot.
lovely delivery from Roach swinging away and Tharanga follows it and gets beaten.
opens the face off the bat and steers it down to third man.
inside edges down to fine leg
driven on the front foot to cover point.
short and wide outside the off stump, Dilshan hammers it down to extra cover fence.
pushes to mid-off for a single.
opens the face off the bat and glides it down to third man.
on the leg stump and hit on the pad.
driven off the front foot to mid-off.
half-volley driven to deep extra cover.
pushes wide of mid-off for a single.
played down to fine leg for a single.
driven firmly to extra cover.
short ball pulled to deep backward square leg, Rampaul fields nicely near the boundary ropes, referred to third umpire.
outside the off stump left alone.
driven back to the bowler.
defended on the front foot.
this time defends off the back foot.
driven off the front foot through covers, good running by Tharanga.
on the front foot driven to mid-off.
plays from the crease as the ball comes in.
driven through covers for a quick single.
plays forward and gets an outside edge down to third man.
driven straight to backward point.
short and wide, cuts it hard but straight to point.
plays softly to the off side and picks up a quick single.
goes for a big booming drive and gets beaten.
Rampaul strikes, short ball too close to the body fro Dilshan to cut, finds the outside edge and straight to Baugh behind the wicket.
outside the off stump and left alone.
plays it down to fine leg.
outside the off stump, left alone.
driven off the front foot to point.
played in the air just wide of short cover fielder.
driven straight to mid-off.
pushes to cover point on the front foot.
cuts it down to backward point, wide of third man.
defends on the front foot.
cuts it uppishly down to deep point.
plays it down to fine leg.
driven straight to mid-off.
defends on the front foot.
driven nicely through extra cover on the front foot.
angles his bat and plays it down to third man.
thick outside edge and Gayle gets his finger tips at slip.
driven to mid-on.
driven from the crease to extra cover.
good looking cover drive but straight to Sammy at short extra cover.
low full toss and Sangakkara fails to put it away.
driven wide of mid-off.
works to the onside to midwicket.
driven on the front foot to mid-off.
opens the face off the bat and steers it down to third man.
outside the off stump and cut to the sweeper cover.
short ball pulled to midwicket.
too far outside the off stump.
defends to the off side.
defends on the track.
defends the last ball to the off side.
outside the off stump and cut down to third man.
punches off the back foot to sweeper cover.
driven through covers to the sweeper cover.
defends on the back foot.
played to short fine leg.
driven down the ground to long off.
driven to the sweeper cover.
cuts it to deep backward point for couple of runs.
cuts it down to point.
comes down the track and driven to long on.
driven to mid-on.
turns it to midwicket.
opens the face off the bat and glides it down to third man.
driven straight to extra cover.
on the front foot and driven through extra cover.
cuts off the back foot to deep extra cover.
driven off the back foot to long off.
driven back to the bowler.
on the legs and flicked to deep square leg.
down the leg side.
down the leg side and Baugh fails to gather it.
defends to the off side.
nicely driven in the gap between mid-off and extra cover to the fence for a boundary.
pushed to the off side to extra cover.
punches off the back foot to deep extra cover.
flicks it down to deep backward square leg.
short ball and Tharanga pulls it well to the midwicket fence for a boundary.
driven down the ground to long off.
defends on the front foot.
driven back to the bowler.
pushes in the gap at cover for a single.
driven back to the bowler.
sweeps it down to fine leg.
defends on the front foot.
driven on the front foot to deep extra cover.
defends on the front foot.
flicks it down to deep backward square leg.
driven to mid-off.
pushes off the back foot to midwicket.
off the back foot angled down to third man.
outside edge goes past the keeper and third man has no chance to field it.
driven down the ground to long off.
driven in the air and just short of Pollard at backward point.
nice straight drive down the ground.
short ball pulled to deep midwicket.
defends on the front foot.
driven straight past the bowler and down to long on.
defends to the off side.
cuts off the back foot to backward point.
driven off the front foot through covers.
cut nicely off the back foot past Pollard at backward point.
defends to the off side.
half-volley and Sangakkara drives in the air firmly to short extra cover and Gayle takes the catch.
flicks to deep midwicket.
sweeps and gets a top edge, the ball lands safely.
flicks it down to deep midwicket.
defends.
tries to cut, beats the outside edge.
way outside the off stump and Tharanga misses it.
driven to mid-off on the front foot.
driven on the front foot to deep extra cover, Mahela slips and falls down and there was no chance for a second run.
flicks it down to deep midwicket.
cuts it off the back foot to deep extra cover.
driven down the ground to long on.
way down the leg side.
worked to midwicket.
off the pad to short fine leg.
tries to cut and gets beaten.
defends on the front foot.
driven through extra cover.
outside the off stump and cut away to the sweeper cover.
opens the face off the bat and plays it down to third man.
cuts to point off the back foot.
driven down the ground to long off.
short and wide outside the off stump, opens the face off the bat and down to the fence for a boundary.
defends to the off side.
driven down the ground to long on.
outside the off stump and Jayawardene cuts off the back foot to the fence for a boundary.
sweeps it down to fine leg.
pushes in the gap at cover for a single.
short ball pulled to deep square leg.
late swing from Rampaul, beats the outside edge.
defends off the back foot.
outside the off stump, Tharanga looking to cut, misses it and gets beaten.
off the back foot cuts it to deep backward point.
way down the leg side and Baugh fails to gather.
down the track and hits in the air to long on, referred to the third umpire to check if Roach has fielded the ball cleanly.
opens the face off the bat and plays it down to third man.
driven back to the bowler.
driven down the ground to long on.
flicks it to deep backward square leg.
short ball pulled away to deep midwicket.
driven straight to short extra cover.
opens the face off the bat and plays it very fine to third man fence, Roach running around cannot stop it.
short ball and Tharanga pulls well to the midwicket fence.
beats the outside edge.
short ball pulled away to midwicket, a mistimed shot.
slower delivery, watchfully played by Jayawardene.
flicks it to deep backward square leg.
driven in the air over the bowlers head to the fence for a boundary.
short ball and Jayawardene defends.
just outside the off stump, tries to drive and gets beaten.
cuts it straight to backward point.
outside the off stump, looks to drive it through the off side, hits the ground in the process, loud shout for a catch turned down.
defended.
cuts it behind point.
defends on the front foot.
opens the face off the bat and glides it down to third man.
upper cuts and falls short of Miller at third man.
pushes to backward point
pulled away to deep midwicket.
defended.
way down the leg side.
short and pulled to deep backward square leg.
driven through covers to the sweeper.
guides it down to third man.
short delivery and Tharanga pulls to the midwicket fence, superb shot.
short once again, pulled to deep midwicket.
plays to short fine and picks up a quick single.
short ball and Jayawardene pulls to backward square leg fence for a boundary.
cuts to deep backward point, wonderful running.
flicks to deep square leg and moves onto 97.
opens the face off the bat and steers it down to third man.
short ball which goes way over the batsman, not signaled a wide.
defends the last ball.
Tharanga moves onto 98 with that single.
9th ODI century for Tharanga, short and wide outside the off stump, cuts it deep cover, misfielded by Miller.
left alone outside the off stump.
keeps low outside the off stump, cuts and misses.
off the pad to the onside and they scamper for a leg bye.
opens the face off the bat and steers it down to third man.
plays behind point.
driven on the front foot to the sweeper cover.
cuts off the back foot.
short and wide outside the off stump, cut away in the air over extra cover to the fence.
